Reviews.Title: Canon SX 50 HS comments
Reviews.Author: Suzanne R Lamble
Reviews.Content: Camera is wonderful and easy to use for us non-professionals.  We've been taking bird pictures and were getting excellent zoom photos by Number 77 (baby Robin).  Then we got really good close ups of Ospreys on their nest.  I was happy to have bought the bundle because we didn't really know what was best.  For example, we wanted a tripod and received three (big, small, and one with flexible legs.The tripod we like the best is short, intended for table top use, but is the easiest for us to use even when hand held.  I like the gimbal mount and there is less motion when starting and stopping.The camera case is superb and has plenty of room for accessories but is easy to carry.We had no idea of what kind of SD card to buy and the one included, Sony SD HC 32 GB 40 ms/s, is working perfectly.We really must stop and read the entire instruction manual.  The hardcopy "fast start" is good enough to begin with.I hope (some rainy day) to read carefully the .pdf version.  I'm sure it contains much valuable information.Would we buy it again?  "You betcha".Thank youPS Took a picture of deer last night in our backyard - it was dark but photo still came out.We are off to take pictures of Big Blue Herons.  They are nesting on an island in the Savannah River.Wish there was a place to add a couple photos - they tell a better story than I can write.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Buy!!
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Bodon-Aponte
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera because of the zoom! Boy was I happy and surprised. Not to mention all the neat features that are on this camera.  There is so much you can do.  The company I purchased from did a great job with the packaging and all the extras were great as well.  I went to a mlb game and was able to zoom out to the outfield clearly from field level a couple of rows behind third base line.  It's a great point and shoot camera and many options to bring out your artistic side.  I would recommend to anyone!!!

Reviews.Title: Camera OK, accessory kit not.
Reviews.Author: CB
Reviews.Content: The camera seems fine, but the kit is of almost no value except for the battery. The kit comes with two tripods. Both flimsy little things that are absolutely not useable with this camera when the telephoto lens is extended. I wish I had bought the extras separately myself and gotten things that really work.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Ali
Reviews.Content: Great camera.  It's zooms in like I wanted.  Was a little disappointed in the camera tripod, but that is miner.

Reviews.Title: Good starter camera
Reviews.Author: Deanne McKinney
Reviews.Content: I've had this camera for almost three months. I use it almost daily to photograph birds and other wildlife, for the most part.Pros: The 50x optical zoom is, by far, the best feature of this camera. Subjects that are far away can be viewed by simply pulling back on the lever that's attached to the shutter button. The zoom can be set, in the camera functions, to use or not to use the digital zoom that will push the zoom range to 200x. Not a good choice for picture-taking, though, as the subject gets blurry and pixelated by doing that, but it's helpful in some situations.The zoom function out performs my binoculars, so i don't have to lug those around any more.The camera is fairly lightweight so the strap doesn't wear a rut into your neck, even when carrying the camera around for several hours.This camera is programmable. It lets you select your favorite settings and save them to use at other times, or you can use the Auto function, letting the camera select what it thinks are the best settings for the shot.You can shoot in .jpg, RAW or both.Takes pretty good pictures when the subject isn't too close or too far away. I have taken pictures of birds that were 100 yards away that came out clear. Not professional quality, and they required some intensive editing, but clear enough to be able to identify the birds.The bundle came with several accessories, a few of which are very nice to have, such as a 32GB memory card, an extra battery, a wall charger, carrying case and a lens cleaning kit. The other accessories I haven't had much use for yet are the two table-top tripods, memory card wallet, a 50" tripod, lens protector sheets and the USB connector.Cons:  The camera is slow to focus on the subject in the center of the screen. It likes to focus on the closest object it sees, so when the intended subject is not the closest, you have to push the the shutter button half way multiple times in order for it to finally focus on your target. This isn't helpful when you're trying to photograph a fast moving bird. You can lose your shot in a spit second because the camera wouldn't focus on what was in the center of the viewing area.Good photos are possible when good lighting is available.There is a long delay between the time that you push the lever on the shutter button before the lens will retract. I've found that it's faster to turn the camera off.Setting the manual functions is confusing and frustrating. The programming menu is difficult to navigate.Macro shots are not possible, even while using the macro setting. The camera will not focus on subjects closer than about 4 feet in front of you.Poor picture quality in low-light settings. The pictures are grainy.The camera goes through batteries pretty quickly. If you're going to do a day's worth of shooting, you'll need a second or possibly a third battery.Overall:  This is a good starter camera for anyone wanting to learn how to use a camera with lots of bells and whistles. The price is fair for the quality of this camera. Learning to use the camera can be a challenge, but it can be mastered with practice and reading the manual (on CD) over and over.  The bundle is a nice, easy way to get the extra items that you will use. One thing I would like to have that is not included is a UV filter for the lens.

Reviews.Title: nice
Reviews.Author: Haitham
Reviews.Content: very nice according to its price , it isn't comparable with professional onesbut its fast & have many options , the package is very helpful and amazing .the zoom is amazing (50X)

Reviews.Title: I JUST LOVE THIS CAMERA !
Reviews.Author: pjac3407
Reviews.Content: The price was GREAT and it came with accessories that you wouldn't have gotten in the store !  The zoom feature is OUTRAGEOUS !  I felt like I was doing  undercover surveillance !

Reviews.Title: Very happy with this
Reviews.Author: M. Schermerhorn "Laughter is the best medicine"
Reviews.Content: I am an avid nature enthusiast and am astounded in how clear the images and video are coming out.  I am not one for sitting down to read the full manual and practice with focusing and the like.  I took the camera out of the box, charged the battery and ventured into the forest.  So far I have been able to film up to 5 minutes of a wood thrush singing high up in a lob lolly pine where you see his beak and throat movements from afar.  The next great moment happened near a swamp where I filmed up to 4 minutes of a where a water moccasin was, on the hunt for food.  It body was clearly defined as it swam on the surface of the brackish waters, zig zagging its way through lily pads and duck weed. That forked tongue was in and out constantly and the camera picked up those fragmented moves clearly. I did not stay long enough to see who the unfortunate victim was however.You know you have made a good purchase when you equally as excited about seeing the video as you the purchase.  The equipment package that came with the came but the only thing I have used in this kit is the tall tripod.  The tripod itself suits the moment but feels cheap.  It is fine for my use at the point but I am sure that as the hobby grows, so will the knowledge of related products.The camera itself is around 350 but I bought total kit for around an extra 100.  The kits meets all of my initial needs for now.  350 if very reasonable for a camera such as this.  The Canon reliability is also a proven in our household (we have 3 canon power shot shot camera that we use for those instant moments just to capture simultaneous events of the day and they too are stellar).Give it a try...if you have even a basic knowledge you can be out in minutes capturing those miraculous wonders of the natural world.  Hint...if you get creeped by the forest, then practice on floral designs instead. This capture I am sure when serve equally as well.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: Scott Famulare
Reviews.Content: very happy with this camera and accessories that came with it. I am a novice but can use this camera very well

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS digital camera
Reviews.Author: Prudence Wholey
Reviews.Content: I like the camera well enough, particularly the zoom. I do find the buttons a bit close together, so I tend to push them by accident. This may be because I am left handed. I also like the way the camera functions in low light.

Reviews.Title: Great pictures.
Reviews.Author: bjlmj
Reviews.Content: Great pictures, but steady hand or tripod are needed.  Fantastic zoom capability.  Good camera for the money.  For some reason can't see through viewfinder.  Must use the LCD.

Reviews.Title: Great carry-along Canon
Reviews.Author: Lucky 7
Reviews.Content: This little bomb takes exceptional pictures. The zoom & image stabilizer work harmoniously to give you truly exceptional shots with the ease of a point and shoot. The controls are easy to manipulate also. The rechargeable battery outlasts anything I've experienced.

Reviews.Title: Sold to a very happy man....
Reviews.Author: Rizal Azhar
Reviews.Content: Won't talk much about the camera as it is awesome, but more onto the bundle.•32 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card  - 5 star•Additional NB-10L Rechargeable Replacement Battery Pack  - 3 star•All-in-one High-Speed Memory Card Reader  - 3 star•Protective Digital Camera Carrying Case with Pockets and Strap  - 3 star•Universal Memory Card Wallet - 3 star•Package of LCD Screen Protectors - 2 star (had to cut it my self to fix it in the screen)•Full Size 50" Tripod w/Carrying Case - 4 star•Extendable 8" Tabletop Mini Tripod - 3 star•Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - 3 star•HDMI Cable for direct connection to High Definition TV - 3 starSuperb all in all...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: S. Stevens
Reviews.Content: Just returned from vacation and very satisfied with pictures.  Still learning all camera functions.  Disappointed that the bag advertised was substituted with cheaper brand.

Reviews.Title: Satisfied
Reviews.Author: Bernice Kenney
Reviews.Content: I am enjoying it...so easy, fast and convenient...light weight.  Love the speed with which I can shoot.  Looking forward to learning new feathures.

Reviews.Title: awesome deal
Reviews.Author: youngfisher
Reviews.Content: I am very impressed with my PowerShot SX50 HS.  I got a complete package for the price I would see just for the camera on other websites.  The camera is so easy  to learn and use.  Cannon is a camera brand that I have been using for years and they have me as a customer again.  It came in just a few days which is a pleasent surprise.  The Cannon PowerShot SX50 HSis better than I thought possible.  It will focus so fast and the HD is very impressive.  No complaints about this product.  I would gladly recommend this camera to anyone.  It is as user friendly as it gets.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic Camera
Reviews.Author: Lawyer
Reviews.Content: I brought this camera on safari and it was the perfect thing.  Everyone wanted to see my photos because of the fantastic zoom.  I realize that the sensor is not as great as other cameras, but the zoom and auto features are worth it.

Reviews.Title: Excellent
Reviews.Author: Fernando Sergio Andrade
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy.This item met all my expectations.It was exactly what I wanted.The delivery was right on time.Congratulations.Thank you so much !!!

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Di
Reviews.Content: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 50x Optical IS is - super pics, great accessories and very easy to use, no need to carry additional zoom lenses ... 50x is plenty to get what you want and really see it on the picture.

Reviews.Title: camera is good but the vendor lacks service
Reviews.Author: akshat gupta
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent in quality. Although it is an internationally available model, the warranty is valid only for US.To add to that, the vendor did not deliver everything as promised. They said that the additional battery is a sort of back order but it has been 20 days and I am yet to receive the additional battery as promised in the product description.The vendors initial service was good and they respond to the mails quickly but I feel there is a large scope of improvement in there commitment

Reviews.Title: Meets My Needs
Reviews.Author: DRS
Reviews.Content: After buying 2 small Point & Shoot cameras for my wife and continually getting unsatisfactory results, I decided to spend a little more and try this camera.  It works.  The auto focus is good and the zoom is adequate although I question the 50X figure.The end result is my wife is getting better pictures.  The fact that this camera has a separate viewfinder allows for much improved picture taking in bright sun light.  This is extremely important here in Yuma, AZ, where the sun shines 300 days a year.This camera is a keeper.

Reviews.Title: Great Camera!
Reviews.Author: Jeff
Reviews.Content: Awesome camera. Pics are amazing and the zoom incredible. Exactly what I was looking for in a mid sized easy to use camera.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera Package
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth A. Negus
Reviews.Content: I received the Cannon Power Shot SX50 HS with accessories in like no time at all.  Up until now I have only been using a pocket point and shoot camera.  It was easy to learn the basics of the SX50 with the short manuel supplied and I got some great images of lighthouses off shore the very first day.  The zoom is great!  Thoroughly thrilled with the camera.  BTW several of my aquaintences, much more into cameras than I, have this camera and also like it. This SX50 will become my main camera now.  As to the tripods I have not used them, yet.  My main focus was on the camera.  I will say the camera case is a definite plus it is roomy and fits everything except the large tripod.  I like things all in one place ready for anything.  For the price this is a great camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot is all you need.
Reviews.Author: Robin Nickells
Reviews.Content: I purchased this video camera/camera to photograph a wedding that was a few days away which did not give me much time to familiarize myself with the program. Well it was easy to understand and my movies and snapshots were as good as the professional photographer. While taking videos this camera allows you zoom and take still shots at the same time. The stabilizer keeps pictures focused. Downloading to computer was seamless. 12.1 MP and being able to size pictures before you take them help create your best shots.

Reviews.Title: Very pleased
Reviews.Author: Jerry Okubo
Reviews.Content: Very pleased with this camera as well as the extras. I would recommend this product to anyone who likes good imagequality and a super zoom.

Reviews.Title: This camera was a gift to my son and his wife for both of their graduations.
Reviews.Author: Doulie Zimmar
Reviews.Content: A relative from Europe had bought this camera from Amazon and was very pleased with itand its price. He had done an extensive research of cameras prior to his purchase.  We gave this camera as a gift to our son and his wife.  They are now using it extensivelyto take photos of their newborn child.  They report that they are very pleased with its use and the photos/videos.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: GmaRiri "GmaRiri"
Reviews.Content: This was just as advertised. The distance shots are very clear as well as up close. Easy to use. I took it across the country on a family vacation and made of photo book of spectacular pics.

Reviews.Title: Very interessant camera
Reviews.Author: Carlos Markennede Crescencio de Lima
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with this camera. I don't have many experience with photos, but I'm loving to take photos wih this camera.

Reviews.Title: Purchased for a Teen Wanna-be Photographer
Reviews.Author: S. Woods "spar97"
Reviews.Content: This camera came recommended by the guys at a local store. After researching reviews on it, I decided to purchase this for my teen wanna-be photographer.  I can't give specifics, as I don't know a whole lot about these types of cameras.  However, I can tell you the camera takes brilliant sharp photos.  The bag offered with this package is sturdy and well padded.  The seller was quick to ship.  The taller tripod is on the wobbly side, but I'm sure this could be modified by using rubber caps on the bottom of the legs.  The only complaint my daughter has had, is that the neck strap is uncomfortable.  I think a wider band in the back would solve this issue as the camera's weight causes the not-so-wide band to dig into her neck. All in all - we're satisfied.

Reviews.Title: I Love it, but . . . .
Reviews.Author: Daniel W. Lynch "Historian"
Reviews.Content: Camera is unbelieveablely powerful: With a zoom range out to 1200mm (35mm equivalent) and every possible Menu item, And Function and Setting, etc, etc, this is one heck of a bargin. But go get a real Tri Pod and absolutely a Shutter Release switch. At 1200mm with a tripod the image still hops about like a jack rabbit on speed. DWL

Reviews.Title: The camera is too good
Reviews.Author: Pavithra MR
Reviews.Content: Camera quality is good ,the bundle is very usefulIts a good choice to start with quality pictures. Coool

Reviews.Title: Great Camera Package
Reviews.Author: Don Warren
Reviews.Content: My wife was wanting a new camera. We spent days reading reviews on cameras. We decided on the Canon PowerShot SX50 HS camera because of the price and the package of accessories that came with it. My wife has lots to experiment with in this camera package. She is all smiles and is learning how to take great pictures. I would recommend this product to anyone wanting a great camera.

Reviews.Title: I love it!
Reviews.Author: pcaboicu
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera to take to Europe.  I love the zoom and ease of use.  Takes great quality pictures even when zoomed in all the way.  Easy point and shoot.  The bundle was helpful because everything you need comes in one package.  I know 4 other people with this camera and just keep recommending it!

Reviews.Title: it`s great
Reviews.Author: Marisol
Reviews.Content: the zoom is amazing. this camera is perfect :) Is so easy take photos with this camera. :) we like it

Reviews.Title: Fantastic camera
Reviews.Author: Everton T.
Reviews.Content: This câmera is fantastic. It has all the options that i need to take my pictures, to have fun, no more coments. I like it very much.

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: tucker t willert
Reviews.Content: We just got back from Africa, and this camera was awesome. Great Zoom with outstanding quality. We took over 2000 pictures and they came out great, I couldn't be happier with this camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS
Reviews.Author: lag
Reviews.Content: Everything is as described.  Has so many features that I am still exploring.  Many of these features (such as the turnout viewer) is on  cameras costing much more. Takes beautiful shots that are simple to operate re controls, etc.  New to this photography but so far am happy with it for my purposes.  Great value for the money.  Purchased this as a recommendation by a friend who is more familiar with photography.  Not disappointed at all.  Nice size and relatively lightweight.

Reviews.Title: Great camera for optics
Reviews.Author: salemband
Reviews.Content: We like what we understand of the SX50 so far; it takes more than a few stabs to figure out how to do what you want it to.

Reviews.Title: So Excited!
Reviews.Author: Fonda Barnes
Reviews.Content: Some one stole my last camera and it contents. This bundle helped me get back what I lost I got the package in perfect condition and all the contents in tact love love love!!!

Reviews.Title: excellent product
Reviews.Author: ALVARO VALENCIA HERNANDEZ
Reviews.Content: The camera is excellent, the quality of canon is expressed in their productstechnology and ability to shoot is excellent.Your hardware is sturdy and the handling is very simple and practical

Reviews.Title: Good camera.
Reviews.Author: hank
Reviews.Content: We have not had the camera very long, but have been very impressed with it so far. One of the things I liked about it is that all the different camera settings are explained on the screen. These digital cameras have so many options to choose from, I find it difficult to remember them all. The other thing I like about it is the image stabilizer. My wife can finally take pictures that are not fussy. We are both enjoying the camera and the quality pictures it is taking.

Reviews.Title: Spetacular camera
Reviews.Author: Diego de Castro Ribeiro
Reviews.Content: Camera full of functions! very good! Zoom perfect! A camera and very agile with many features! The best of it and the amount of options that comes with it! Their options are all good quality!

Reviews.Title: Fabulous camera
Reviews.Author: E. Hoffman
Reviews.Content: I am thrilled with the quality of this Canon camera.  It satisfies all the requirements I had, including a great zoom (which had been disappointing in previous Canon cameras).  The bundle is a terrific extra for this price.

Reviews.Title: wow the best camera
Reviews.Author: teco
Reviews.Content: this camera is amazing i was looking also for the nikon coolplix p510, but this is much better the only thing that i see to the nikon that this one doest have is that it can take 3D pictures, also they told me than the GPS is very bad. today the camera arrived and i try the zoom like for 3 hours and in the only thing that stop me was my homework and that the battery finish. i thing that this camera is very easy to use and it have plenty of uses, i recommend this camera and this packet is awesome you don't need to buy any thing else, may be the filer but they are not so useful. every minute i discovered new things that impress me i would recommend this camera to every body.

Reviews.Title: Great Deal
Reviews.Author: nd
Reviews.Content: This is a great deal for everything that is provided.  The camera is easy to use and not too bulky. Good for travel and I love the 50X zoom.  Used to capture great photos during my recent gradation.

Reviews.Title: Over Kill for Week-end Photog, but great camera
Reviews.Author: Daniel
Reviews.Content: 1-Delivered on time, intact, well packaged2-Easy to "put together" even for a non-techie3-Camera itself easy to use, even the higher functionsIf you are looking for a very good quality, reasonably priced, upgrade to your pocket camera, this is a very good choice.

Reviews.Title: Amazing
Reviews.Author: Robert V Myers
Reviews.Content: The zoom on it is incredible. It's a perfect starting camera for anyone who wants to become a photographer in anyway. I, for one, want to go into photography so this camera, the kit, tripod, and everything has me on the right track. I live in a little quiet town that has a great amount of forest and we put out bird seed out and I have capture amazing photographs of birds, such as;  "Oregon" Junco, Carolina Wren, Blue Jays, Tufted Titmouse, American Robin, Northern Cardinal, Song Sparrow, Carolina Chickadee (my personal favorite), White-breasted Nuthatch, plenty of Mourning Doves, White-crowned Sparrow, and the House Finch. Also, I get come across deer in my backyard, since they come so close, if I keep my dog quiet, I can get great photos of the deer, as well. I have also taken great photos of family, friends, pets, and now I'm the family photographer. Getting this camera, in my opinion, would be a great start for anyone.

Reviews.Title: Another GREAT Canon PRoduct!
Reviews.Author: Adriaan N. Roggeveen "GeorgiaDreamer"
Reviews.Content: I have owned Canon Cameras for over 40 years. I started wtih the Canon 35MM SLR Ftp, F1, and E1 wgen the first electronic versions were available. This is my first Canon Digital Camera. I have absolutely no reason to be sorry that I 1) stayed with Canon and 2) this package made the experience even better. The Vendor, Focus Camera, shipped eveything neatly, well packaged, and complete, ahead of scheduled delivery. There is actually a written manual that is pertty accurate. The accessories fill all the little slots in a broading (Smaller is Better) Market. Everything is useable though the small tripod is a bit small for secure, handless pictures, but excellent for extra-steady micro/macro photography. THe 'multi-media card reader' is really ahndy for those of us that have more than one type of card to be read. Not all of us use the micro HDSC Cards in all of our devices. I still use the Sony 64M Memory Sticks.....soemtimes. Everything fits quite nicely into the included bag, except the larger tripod. It has a nice carring case taht makes it less of a burden and ready for those..."stand by yourself or include me too shots."I believe that you would be hardpressed to find a betyter combination, at the price and quality, of this excellent Canon product. I do not believe that anyone could make a mistake in purchasing this item. I have found that cameras in cases do not get used much. THe sstrap is strong and hte camera is just the right size to take gigabytes of pictures to support those thousands of words we share about the events in our lives that alter and illuminate them.

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Alberto S Moraes
Reviews.Content: Wonderful package. I strongly recommend the product and the seller. The camera is fantastic. Got amazing pictures of the moon. It came with announced plus a photo edition software and a third small tripod. Very good value.

Reviews.Title: AWESOME CAMERA!
Reviews.Author: fIRECRACKER
Reviews.Content: Very happy with the QUALITY of the pics. from this camera. GREAT ZOOM for nature pics. also has great image stabilization, 1080p FULL HD VIDEO--Which was terrific for capturing Grandson in action. Highly recommend this camera for beginners and professionals.

Reviews.Title: Love the camera.  The accessories ???
Reviews.Author: Brian Hahn
Reviews.Content: Just got the camera and I loveit.  The accessories are great.  Extra battery, HDMI cable, SD card, cleaning kit, bad and card reader.  The smaller tripod is good but the bigger one is a little flimsy and feels like it would break with not much pressure.  The memory card wallet and LCD screen protectors were missing.  I guess they tried to compensate with this gripster camera tripod that has flexable legs on it which I don't really need but I guess.

Reviews.Title: excelent!!
Reviews.Author: lucila
Reviews.Content: everything is excelent the camera, and all of the accesories. very very good, it works everything perfectly.i love it. the shipped was quickly and perfect.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic zoom
Reviews.Author: Teresa Kulic
Reviews.Content: Great camera with an amazing zoom and long battery life.  So glad I chose this one!  The only thing it's missing is the camera cable to connect it to the computer so that you can use the software.

Reviews.Title: Accessory kit not only incomplete, they sent the wrong battery.
Reviews.Author: Tami Beckham
Reviews.Content: My kit was incomplete, then when opened for a birthday present, it was discovered the battery included wasn't the right battery for the camera.  Very dissappointed!

Reviews.Title: Great service from the store but i dont recommend the camera for shootings on the beach
Reviews.Author: Pablo Lopez
Reviews.Content: I got an incomplete package but as soon as i said something i got a refund so thanks for your great attention!!! Nevertheless, i would say to people to consider buying this camera if you want/plan to use it on the beach. I just bought the camera a couple of weeks ago and took it to the beach and it turns out the lens is not recommended to use on the beach and now it has a lense error. I looked on the internet and it turns out its a really regular problem with power shot cameras. So if you plan to take your camera to the beach i would reconsider it. I now have to pay to fix the camera since im out of USA and the guarantee is only applicable in USA /Canada. But great service from the store, loved the package!! the camera not so much now...

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: DAVID R WALKER
Reviews.Content: Easy to use.Great pictures.has both LCD screen and eye viewer.Battery in kit is as good as original and memory card nice

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera - slow focus
Reviews.Author: katespleasures
Reviews.Content: Got for birding documentation and I love the zoom power and picture quality at reasonable cost.  It is large enough that there is some shake at full zoom and it takes more time to focus than I would like.  Maybe I will get better with more practice.  .

Reviews.Title: Amazing!
Reviews.Author: Gustavo Sabadine Assad Simao
Reviews.Content: Amazing camera! Better than I expected! After research I choose this camera and I don't regreat. I'm really happy for choose her.

Reviews.Title: Not the Bundle Advertised
Reviews.Author: DG
Reviews.Content: Canon does not include the USB cable with this camera, which you need in order to install software and access the full manual.  So okay, ordered the USB cable.  Without having the cable in order to use the camera to its fullest yet, I can say the camera does seem to be in good working order and will have loads of options (once I have the USB cable and get to that manual!).  My poor rating is specific to the so-called "bundle".  I feel Focus needs to get their act together and assemble their bundle like they advertise it to be.  When I received this "bundle" it was missing the correct battery, the carrying case, the universal memory card wallet, the package of LCD screen protectors, and the lens care cleaning kit.  I will say that Amazon responded very quickly to my complaint, and they provided a speedy partial refund which was enough to cover my cost of separately purchasing the missing items.  But what a goat rope!

Reviews.Title: Good Camera
Reviews.Author: Robert Ragain
Reviews.Content: All seems good except the sd card was 16gb instead of 32gb.  (Reason for only 4 stars)  Don't know that I will use all the items included in the kit but will have them on hand if needed.  Shipment was on time and arrived in two days.  All in all nice product.

Reviews.Title: Enjoying photography!
Reviews.Author: Mella D. Jacobs
Reviews.Content: Love this camera, easy to use, great pictures and very light and small for all the hiking I do. Waited a long time to make the decision to buy this particular camera, wish I'd have done it a long time ago.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: Molly Lawhon
Reviews.Content: Still learning how to use this wonderful camera to it full capacity. Am very pleased with the camera so far. Anticipate  using it a great deal in the future.

Reviews.Title: Great Package from Focus.
Reviews.Author: Kindle Customer
Reviews.Content: Great package! Everything needed except a usb cord. Camera software will not load on my computer recognizing the camera with the hdmi, needs usb. Like the size and quality of the case, and the camera is wonderful right out of the box on auto. Plan to spend some time learning and practicing all the features.  The zoom is spectacular!

Reviews.Title: Awesome !!
Reviews.Author: LindaLMartin Artist
Reviews.Content: I absolutely loved having this complete kit and ready to go. Perfect for travel and for those unexpected shots. Im still learning all the aspects of it, however sometimes I do miss shots when I am hitting the button. Learning how to keep it steady. The ease of it is awesome. And I got some awesome shots of the moon just pryor to the Blood Moon on April 15. Love this Camera!

Reviews.Title: This camera is a must!
Reviews.Author: Karen M. Bonde
Reviews.Content: I love this camera!  I can't believe the photos that it takes.  I have never been able to take successful bird photos with a telephoto until I bought this camera.  I used the video to make an oral history of my 101 year old mother.  I like the feature that allows you to take stills while taking a video!

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: dawn wittman
Reviews.Content: Great. Am enjoying using daily Everything I was hoping and expecting  Definitely recommend. Easy to use and operate  Thank You

Reviews.Title: The bundle content is different than on the picture - that is not fair
Reviews.Author: Joerg Engmann
Reviews.Content: Unfortunately the bundle doesn't exactly contain what was described and what was on the picture. The camera case is smaller as shown and doesn't have 2 side pockets. Appearantly it was recently changed to a smaller one since other customers were refering to a big camera case. The SD card holder is a different one, out of plastics and  too big to stow. The bottle of the lense care fluid was leaking and created a mass in the plastic bag. The charger is different as well but o.k.

Reviews.Title: The camera is EXCELLENT!!!
Reviews.Author: Rich P
Reviews.Content: I love the pictures this camera takes.  The zoom is phenomenal.  From 200+ feet away I was able to zoom and get a picture of the individual needles on a pine tree.  My biggest c omplaint would be the proprietary battery.  So I always have to make sure the batteries are ready to go rather than being able to buy AA's at any convenience or drug store when they run low..  Overall it's a very good purchase!

Reviews.Title: Great camera and accessory set.
Reviews.Author: J. Hartman
Reviews.Content: We have been looking for a new camera to replace our old point and shoot Canon for a while and decided on this one after several great reviews. The camera itself is great and pictures are clear and bright. The only con is that the flash does not automatically pop up when it needs to, it is manual. but that is a small inconvenience to a great overall camera.

Reviews.Title: I cannot open the Users Manual disk
Reviews.Author: Priscilla B. Zimmermann
Reviews.Content: I love the camera but I cannot open the Users' Manual Disk.  Is there a way to get a hard copy of the manual? I need a hard copy in order to really get the benefit of my new camera.Thank you.Priscilla Zimmermanneupri@aol.com

Reviews.Title: Canon SX 50
Reviews.Author: Daphne Mason "I like excellent novels or hist...
Reviews.Content: Like the camera very much.  Love the zoom lens that adjusts near and far. Can take pics of animals that are at a distance.It has menus that are fairly intuitive as far as menus go.Very pleased!!

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: amigo
Reviews.Content: Very nice camera. Love it. Zooms in very nice. But the stands are low quality so you should buy different ones

Reviews.Title: Canon delivers
Reviews.Author: SHARON L. SMITH
Reviews.Content: The quality of the camera is equal to higher priced cameras, is easy to use and delivers great results.  I have used a Canon camera in the 35mm days and had exceptional results.  This camera was chosen based on previous product knowledge and the desire to try the digital experience.

Reviews.Title: So far so good
Reviews.Author: M. Aukes
Reviews.Content: My daughter got this as a Christmas present.  So far no complaints, the quality of the pictures seem to be really good, lots of accessories.

Reviews.Title: Canon Powershot SX50 HS
Reviews.Author: sandra dallaire
Reviews.Content: After reading reviews on the Canon Powershot SX50 HS and talking with friends that also have a Canon we ordered it.  We are please to say that it lives up to our expectations.  We are having fun learning about all it's many features and feel satisfied with our purchase.

Reviews.Title: Recent purchase of Camera Gift from Amazon.com
Reviews.Author: john allen
Reviews.Content: Purchased as a Christmas Gift for my wife.  Rated 5 Stars my shopping experience with Amazon.con.  As for the New Camera, my wife is happy to have received one, but as yet to try it out.

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShost SX50 HS
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: I was struggling to view and photograph some geese when I saw what could be captured with the SX50 and was very impressed. Of course, when observing with SX50 set for 1200mm, a tripod is a must. This kit came with three tripods! My main camera is a Canon 60D, so my major use of the SX50 will be for those objects beyond the 60D 400mm telephoto range.

Reviews.Title: Bought as a Christmas present
Reviews.Author: Cheryl Grohn
Reviews.Content: Exactly what he asked for. I decided to get the gift package so he had all the accessories, and he was very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Just the thing
Reviews.Author: jimbozz
Reviews.Content: This is a gift and it will be very much liked. The person has been wanting something like this for a number of years. Hope it is as good as advertised.

Reviews.Title: Christmas gift?
Reviews.Author: linda
Reviews.Content: My wife and I had this dropshipped as a Christmas gift to her daughter and friend.  We are getting some pretty incredible pictures of Florida where they live.  ( and yes I know its not even Christmas yet- what's with that!)  Thanks a very pleasing transaction.

Reviews.Title: This camera is fantastic. Just look at my blog
Reviews.Author: Renee Johnson
Reviews.Content: This camera is fantastic.  Just look at my blog, [...] for examples of the pictures I have been able to take with it.  Even the craters on the moon pick up.  And it focuses automatically.  I highly recommend this camera.

Reviews.Title: Canon Power SX50 Hs
Reviews.Author: Leroy R. Armstrong
Reviews.Content: I live on a large lake.This camera allows me to take pictures of wildlife that would not happen with other cameras.Also the zoom has already given some supper pictures. Love it.I think I have a great Camera.

Reviews.Title: Takes great pictures.
Reviews.Author: Marjorie A. Allen
Reviews.Content: Best camera I ever owned.  The zoom is fantastic.  The package had everything I could possible want for this camera in there.  And we got it quickly.  Perfect.

Reviews.Title: A very good buy
Reviews.Author: Dennis O. Reyerson
Reviews.Content: So far it's been great.  Nice clears sharp pictures.  It will be better once I learn what all the buttons are for.

Reviews.Title: Decision Pending
Reviews.Author: E. Krumbah "Patriot"
Reviews.Content: Purchased for a gift. Will give follow up after Christmas. So far, all items offered in bundle arrived. Looks good so far.

Reviews.Title: Fantastic
Reviews.Author: Keith Campbell "Keith Campbell"
Reviews.Content: Fantastic 50x Wide-Angle Optical Zoom. There are many great extra features and options on the system that permits better photos.  The battery life was quite adequate.  Overall,  an excellent camera, in great price-range, that provides  exceptional features for both the amateur and the professionals. Would recommend a good quality tripod for stabilization for 50x zoom although we do well freehand in the auto mode.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Heidi H Linnemann
Reviews.Content: Camera is every bit as fantastic as described. Easy to use and great options. Tripods not worth much, though, too flimsy for use.

Reviews.Title: Great buy
Reviews.Author: Laura Scritchfield
Reviews.Content: I love it!  everything was in perfect condition just as expected. I would definitely recommend the camera and the purchase from Amazon and Focus was easy and it arrived within a week.

Reviews.Title: Very good service
Reviews.Author: Micaela Azcona Sevenants
Reviews.Content: I'm very happy with the camera! it's all I wanted. The pictures I take with the camera come out excellent. This is my first camera a bit more professional, I've been a prisoner of regular small digital cameras but this one is much better, including the amazing zoom it has. The battery life of the camera is also ver good and lasts plenty, but remember this package comes with one extra one just in case. I hope that if you decide to buy one yourself, you enjoy as much as I do.

Reviews.Title: I really, really like this camera....
Reviews.Author: Runs with scissors
Reviews.Content: I'm not sure if this is a fair review, as I'm a beginner with photography and I haven't mastered this camera yet.  I only owned point-and-shoot cameras before.  So far, the pictures I've taken have turned out "fabulous" (to my un-trained eye, anyway.)It was pretty expensive though.  The jury is still out if I will learn to use it well enough, and enjoy it enough to make it worth the cost.  But right out of the gate....the first thing a beginner will notice is that it doesn't come with a users-manual.  Oh it has a little basic pamphlet, and a disc that you can use to "print" your own manual.  As soon as you hit "print", you had better have an entire ream of paper in your printer tho.  Over 200 pages, and that's just the english version, and that's picking and choosing which chapters apply to you.  This camera has alot of do-hickies!  It is a little daunting to try to remember what does what, but I am enjoying learning a new hobby.  And if it ends up losing its new-toy-appeal, it is a wonderfully, expensive point-and-shoot when it's on auto-mode!Still....HOW FUN!

Reviews.Title: I love this camera!
Reviews.Author: Cyndy
Reviews.Content: Very good and fairly easy to use. I also got a remote for it. WHen I tqke picture of birds on the tri pod it is much esier with the remote.

Reviews.Title: SX50 captures beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: abw13
Reviews.Content: I'm still learning about the SX50, but I love everything about it so far.  Obviously, you can't beat the zoom capabilities.  For me, it sure beats carrying lots of lenses and bulky camera equipment and the time it takes to switch lenses out.  I think that was the final selling point.  The kit had everything I needed and I haven't even used most of it yet.  I highly recommend the camera and the kit.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Dr. Lenarth Robert
Reviews.Content: great camera, worked perfectly I am very pleasead with the puchase. Ideal for those who whant a high and camera but don't want an SLR

Reviews.Title: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS 9 pcs combo
Reviews.Author: aloha
Reviews.Content: The camera is outstanding.  Even a beginner like me can take wonderful pictures.  The camera is easy to use.  The zoom is exactly what I needed to shoot from far away with good results.  I usual take pictures with my Iphone but this is way way better.  The tripod had to be returned because the mechanism that secure the leg fell out.  It's been awhile and haven't heard anything about a rep?acement or credit.

Reviews.Title: Very impressed!
Reviews.Author: Nate
Reviews.Content: This is a great buy. It is my third digital camera. The speed of focus is very impressive. I purchased this camera because we are about to vacation on African safari. I did not want to fiddle with changing lenses or have to carry a second video camera. The Powershot fills the need nicely. An added bonus was the automatic ability to get 50X zoom with auto digital times 2 (100X). I am still learning all the controls but was basically up and running as soon as the primary battery was charged. Some reviewers give this camera a knock for less than stellar sharpness above 25X and I disagree. My taste is to print up to 8 x 10 shots. I am not interested in billboard shots nor am I a pro. Just want a grest snapshot and this camera is great for that. I only want to impress myself and my neighbors. Following added after return from Kenya (7-10-13). The camera performed better than I hoped. I have pictures of leopards in trees, lion cubs waiting for their mother, baby cheetah and mother and open winged buzzards coming in for dinner. There were six of us traveling together and I think I got the best shots. I would caution that it is easy to run the battery down by zooming in and out. Because this is 12.1 MPS I suggest you not pose the picture in the viewfinder. Shoot on a wider angle and then crop. Trying to zoom in on a moving lion or leopard is too hard and your hands will shake and over 35X you will never refocus on the subject. When taking shots of people use you flash to fill in the shadows. When I have more time I'll post a few shots I am very impressed with. Another trick I learned was to flip the viewfinder out to the side and then angle it up while resting the camera on the padded support bar. This allowed me to look down and follow action while the frame of the vehicle acted as a firm support.

ProductInfo.Features:
Bright 2.8-inch Vari-angle LCD with 461,000 dots plus electronic viewfinder
12.1 megapixel high-sensitivity CMOS sensor, High Speed AF Focuses in 0.19 sec
DIGIC 5 image processor
50x optical zoom (4.3-215.0 mm) and 24mm wide-angle lens with Optical Image Stabilizer
Smart AUTO feature intelligently selects the proper camera settings based on 58 predefined shooting situations
ProductInfo.Name: Canon PowerShot SX50 HS 12.1 MP Digital Camera with 50x Optical IS Zoom + NB-10L Battery + 9pc Bundle 32GB Deluxe Accessory Kit
